Author: TOM47
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Beta test sign up https://medium.com/@socialx/beta-test-sign-up-eb98fdae5e75  Today marks another important step in the SocialX journey. With the successful ICO behind us, we know that you’ve all been waiting for the implementation of the SocialX project. We are pleased to announce that the closed beta test will be released soon!  Registration for the closed beta test is now open for those who have supported us during the ICO. You can sign up by clicking here and completing the short questionnaire. It is mandatory to provide your email address, first name and the ETH address used in presale or ICO. We will use the email address to distribute the closed beta to you and we will only use it to ask for feedback after our testing. This way you can help us to make improvements before launching our public beta.

Author: elitecstrike
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Closed Beta release date announcement    Closed Beta release date: 25 May 2018 We know you’ve been waiting for this moment to come. We’ve been testing your patience, but we hope you can understand that our main aim has been to work as fast as possible without compromising quality. All beta subscribers will receive information about the beta test and how to report bugs, as well as a link to install the app.  Internal testing started in mid-April, but we decided to add and improve some more features before releasing the first closed beta version. For example, we’re happy to say that decentralisation of files is now implemented.  There’s still a lot of work left for the development team. As you know, the roadmap is the best reference for staying up-to-date with the team’s progress. We will update the roadmap shortly before the release again.  We are looking forward to your support in the next months decentralising the social media landscape with SocialX. Please keep in mind that this is our first Beta build. More will follow as development is continuing non-stop.  Thank you all for your continued support. Its time to take social media to the next level!  https://medium.com/@socialx/closed-beta-release-date-announcement-87717e8f87d5

Author: NightDream
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: October Recap Here’s our monthly recap with an update about SocialX going Open-Source and the introduction of two new additions to our team  We completed the entire outline for a decentralized future of socialX, the work which was executed within this months was tremendous. For this reason we decided to publish the current codebase as our open source initiative within SocialX and provide our community the transparency they deserve. The reason why we did not publish our code earlier is simple. We did not want to provide too much information about how to build a fully decentralised social network, to our competitors who might be listening closely. To say that a social network is decentralised is easy but to actually executing a fully decentralised social network is a major milestone achieved by our team.  https://medium.com/@socialx/october-recap-4d7f35cbb4b3

Author: Kriptobt1
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: SocialX Database System https://medium.com/@socialx/socialx-database-system-2c8910a110bb  During the last months we build a scalable and decentralised social media network as we promised earlier this year. Now it’s time to release it bit by bit to ensure that everyone will have SocialX on his radar over the next months. With over 662 commits we will soon be able to present you the latest stage of the app. The private circle will be the first to get a glance at the App followed by everyone who signed up for the beta.  But of course in order to publish the beta we needed to design a stable infrastructure. Figure 1 displays the infrastructure we have chosen for running SocialX.  As you can see we are using database peers as one important part of our infrastructure. This blogpost aims to explain how you can setup a database peer to support the decentralised approach of SocialX.

Author: Kirilp
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: An open letter to our community https://medium.com/@socialx/an-open-letter-to-our-community-cd41a05f8212  Team update: SocialX and Theodor (CTO) part ways.  The past weeks have been a rollercoaster ride for the entire SocialX Team, with primarily positive experiences. The successful ICO was a big moment for us. We are very optimistic about SocialX changing the future of how the human species interacts socially. Our ultimate goal is to change the social media landscape by creating a decentralized network with a unique reward mechanism. To reach our goal, we need 100% commitment from all our team members.

Author: AdobeWriter
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Just a little left till the alpha release and the ICO start I guess. The very fact that they postponed the crowdfunding so they can show a working early version of the product should speak clearly that this is not a scam unlike many other ICOs out there with deadlines set in the distant future that they don't even plan to meet. A scam would just post some flashy pictures and a few highly edited videos, then hold a quick ICO to collect several hundred ETH and disappear without typing a single line of code.  Not to mention everyone on the team is out there with their names and faces and not hiding behind fake linkedin accounts with google search stock photos.

Everybody has an access to google/bing. Anybody with any doubts about the team members can easily google their names to check their history/identities. Most of them are easy to find. Also, you can go to their slack and have a chat with the team members, see previous conversations.  Apart from this, in case you didn't know, tech part of the SocialX team even has an own company (https://www.cultofcoders.com/). They know their stuff.

Author: burner2015
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Hi, first of all yes you are right it has a lot from Instagram and we like Instagram.  On a closer look it will be a bit more complex as we combining also the power of an upvote system as Steemit.com uses it (maybe in a different way than Steemit)  with the power of licensing your media (videos & photos) to sell the license for commercial usage (you don't have to license your media but you can do that).  But the most important part is that no one than you (the uploader) will own the media,  if you compare that to the big companies out there as you mentioned for example Instagram then you see that we want to change the pure monopoly and the fact that the photos you upload to Instagram are free to use for Instagram as you give them some rights of your media.  Stay updated here or via our socials, we will release our Whitepaper latest on the 14.08 to clarify some questions.

Author: wintwowin
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Hello,  This is good question.  Current blockchain technology doesn't offer fast solutions which could match existing client server technologies and be scale-able enough. This is why our solution will be a hybrid of client server solutions and blockchian.  Blockchain application will only be responsible for important and crucial components like user registration, upvoting, rewards and financial transactions. In addition every blockchain data already in existence will be mirrored on client server components in essence cached for quick access.  As solutions like bigchainDb and Swarm mature, we will possibly integrate them. We are also in the process of researching of our own blockchain Pos solution to allow for fee-free usage of blockchain. Obviously with millions of users, even small fees would be adding up.  We will be also adding an affiliate program to our platform which will pay rewards in tokens easily convertible into other crypto currencies. I've bee involved in affiliate programs for last 15 years.  Bogdan Fiedur

Author: burner2015
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: Status is a browser, messenger, and gateway to a decentralized world.  SocialX:: I guess our website explains it hopefully well https://socialx.network/  but we are open to feedback (best is you join our Slack to open some discussions we are happy if people and the community want to contribute in that).     In own words: "A photo, video and livestream community on the blockchain. With decentralised storage, an upvote system instead of likes and a license management for your photos & videos.    We will include a decrypted messenger as it is needed to built a healthy community.  Feel free to join us in Slack and connect with us:   https://socialxnet.herokuapp.com/

Author: burner2015
Title: [ANN][ICO] SocialX ☰ your decentralized Social Media Platform ☰ ICO: 15.01
Body: FUD is always easy right?  specially with an anonymous Bitcointalk Account.  Let me clear some things up:  1) We know about Social yes. We didn't know about Social when we started this project.   Discussion ended, Social is a competitor and competitors are good for business.   You can as well list Steemit.com if you want or Instagram.com to not focus too much on Social.  2) About the pictures, we love the style. If you don't like it fine.  Connect with me via Linkedin https://www.linkedin.com/in/christianjosephs/   .  3) We are not perfect yet you are right, but we far away from a SCAM.  4)  Self MoD is needed as you see how competitors FUD your post hard.  I told my Team not to delete 99% of the bad posts here, but we will not allow people to promote their ICO (Social).  Let's have a constructive discussion here please.  Thanks, Christian
